page.title: 02THE WARREN GOLF CLUB
page.content: The Warren was built in 1744. It was called The Warren because of all the rabbits that could be found there. There are 700 members. It costs Â£650 to be a member. The owners name is Mr.Durham. There are 18 holes on the golf course. The longest hole is Hylton woods which is 514 yards long and has a par of 5. The shortest hole is The Well Hole. It is 143 yards long and has a par of 3. At the Warren on a saturday afternoon in summer they normally get about 80 people on the golf course. The Warren has tournaments for both men and women. At the Warren there are 12 waitresses and 3 chefs. They use The Warren for christenings,weddings,parties,dinners and dances as well as golf. The Warren golf club is 6 miles east of Chelmsford on the A414.
